thread.title: Fans vent on Twitter after Patriots' ugly first half in Super Bowl LI
thread.title_full: Fans vent on Twitter after Patriots' ugly first half in Super Bowl LI

author: Brian
title: Fans vent on Twitter after Patriots' ugly first half in Super Bowl LI

persons.name: mark j. rebilas mark j. rebilas-usa

text:
Feb 5, 2017 at 9:15p ET 0Shares 
The New England Patriots were a complete disaster in the first half of Super Bowl LI against the Atlanta Falcons. They turned it over twice and rushed for just 35 yards, and Tom Brady was pressured on 13 of 27 dropbacks. 
Their 18-point halftime deficit had a whole bunch of Patriots fans feeling, well, not great. They vented on Twitter, as did a few celebrities, and it was somewhat sad. Mark J. Rebilas Mark J. Rebilas-USA TODAY Sports
